mapper.insert: insert into LOCATION values (#{l_no}, #{l_name}, #{l_photo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{l_lat}, #{l_lon})
mapper.select: select * from LOCATION order by l_no asc
select * from LOCATION where l_no in (select floor(l_no / 100) * 100 from LOCATION) order by l_no
select * from LOCATION where l_no between #{l_no} + 1 and #{l_no} + 99 order by l_no
select l_no from LOCATION where l_no between #{l_no} + 1 and #{l_no} + 99 order by l_no
select * from (select rownum as rn, l_no, l_name from(select * from location order by l_no asc))where rn between (#{p} - 1) * 10 + 1 and #{p} * 10
select * from (select rownum as rn, l_no, l_name from(select * from location where l_name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' order by l_no asc))where rn between (#{p} - 1) * 10 + 1 and #{p} * 10
select count(l_no) from location where l_name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
select l_photo from LOCATION where l_no = #{l_no}
mapper.update: update LOCATION set l_name = #{l_name}, l_photo = #{l_photo}, l_lat = #{l_lat}, l_lon = #{l_lon} where l_no=#{l_no}
update LOCATION set l_name = #{l_name}, l_lat = #{l_lat}, l_lon = #{l_lon} where l_no=#{l_no}
